faqs.question: Where should I park?
faqs.answer: North Lot is the best place to park for McScottish Night (https://map.concept3d.com/?id=473#!m/126305).

faqs.question: I already bought a ticket, can I donate more?
faqs.answer: If you would like to donate more, you can visit the donations page linked above.

faqs.question: Should I bring my kids?
faqs.answer: McScottish Night will be Mini Murt friendly!  There will also be babysitting services.

faqs.question: Will McScottish Nigh be held outside?
faqs.answer: There will be both indoor events such as Scottish Dancing and outdoor events such as the Highland games.
